Heyo, people.

Remember how I said earlier this morning that I broke a plate, felt tremendous amount of guilt and didn't eat breakfast?
Well, apparently the plate is older than me.

As in, a couple of years older than me.

I broke my elder.

topics.body:
"Previously on The Frollo Show...
Dark was the night when Gaston died, and then Frollo died. Two sexy angels wanted the show. But a trap had been laid for the angels and they gazed up in fear and alarm at a figure whose clutches were iron as much Wilford of the Damned.

Gaston and Frollo saw Hades and they sh*t on his face. And two sexy demons they have to face."

This was an excerpt from Episode 7 of The Frollo Show.
